movie.title: In Case of Emergency
movie.description_intro: In Case of Emergency is a documentary that paints a startling picture of our ERs stretched to the breaking point and exposes the extent of our nation's broken safety net. All of our country's biggest public health challenges-from COVID-19 to the opioid crisis to gun violence to lack of insurance-collide in emergency departments. Nearly half of all medical care in the U.S. is delivered in ERs and nurses are on the frontlines, addressing our physical and emotional needs before sending us back out into the world. In Case of Emergency follows emergency nurses across the U.S, shedding light on their efforts to help break a sometimes-vicious cycle for patients under their care.

movies.title: Kevin Hart: I'm a Grown Little Man
movies.title_english: Kevin Hart: I'm a Grown Little Man
movies.title_long: Kevin Hart: I'm a Grown Little Man (2009)
movies.summary: With his wisecracking one-of-a-kind style of comedy, Kevin Hart pokes fun at everyone - even his audience.
movies.description_full: With his wisecracking one-of-a-kind style of comedy, Kevin Hart pokes fun at everyone - even his audience.
movies.synopsis: With his wisecracking one-of-a-kind style of comedy, Kevin Hart pokes fun at everyone - even his audience.

movies.title: They'll Love Me When I'm Dead
movies.title_english: They'll Love Me When I'm Dead
movies.title_long: They'll Love Me When I'm Dead (2018)
movies.summary: Orson Welles's final movie, The Other Side of the Wind, started filming in 1970 but by the time of his death in 1985 had not been released. It was finally released by Netflix in 2018. This documentary details the making of the movie and the problems Welles had in completing and releasing it.
movies.description_full: Orson Welles's final movie, The Other Side of the Wind, started filming in 1970 but by the time of his death in 1985 had not been released. movies.title: Dolphins in the Deep Blue Ocean
movies.title_english: Dolphins in the Deep Blue Ocean
movies.title_long: Dolphins in the Deep Blue Ocean (2009)
movies.summary: Dolphins are inspiring, playful, strong, exciting, and highly intelligent animals -- and in this documentary, you can see how these beautiful animals frolic in their natural environment in the reef of Eilat in Israel.
movies.description_full: Dolphins are inspiring, playful, strong, exciting, and highly intelligent animals -- and in this documentary, you can see how these beautiful animals frolic in their natural environment in the reef of Eilat in Israel.
movies.synopsis: Dolphins are inspiring, playful, strong, exciting, and highly intelligent animals -- and in this documentary, you can see how these beautiful animals frolic in their natural environment in the reef of Eilat in Israel.

movies.title: Roman Polanski: Wanted and Desired
movies.summary: In 1977, Roman Polanski was arrested in Los Angeles on charges he gave drugs and had sex with a 13-year-old girl he was photographing for Vogue. Eleven months later, having pled guilty to one count, he fled to Europe before sentencing. This film examines that year-long period, using archival footage of the media frenzy and of Polanski's life before the charges, clips from his films, and contemporary interviews with many of the principles - attorneys, the victim, and Polanski's friends and associates. Polanski remains enigmatic, but portraits emerge of the machinations of justice and of a judge more interested in his image than his word or the law.
